```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# This is an R setup chunk, containing default options applied to all other chunks
library(knitr)
# This sets the chunk default options
opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE, cache=TRUE, collapse=TRUE, error=FALSE, prompt=TRUE,fig.align = "center")
# This sets the chunk display theme
thm <- knit_theme$get("edit-kwrite")
knit_theme$set(thm)
# This sets some display options
options(digits=3)
options(width=40)
```
